1.content: We know your going to be a wolf but first pick what are you. Your name and junk will be after this.
1.title: Gender, Rank.

11.content: So you are one of the Alpha's in the pack. What is your name?
11.title: Alpha male

111.content: Your name is Ezekiel, or Zeke, for short. So, which wolf pack do you belong to?
111.title: Zeke's story.

1113.content: Are you a loner, or are you the sole survivor of a ruined pack?
1113.title: No pack?

11131.content: Are you a loner by choice, or because you were banished?
11131.title: A lone wolf.

111312.content: What deed did our lone wolf commit to be banished from his pack?
111312.title: Outcast's life.

11132.content: So, when does the story begin?
11132.title: Tragedy wolfified.

111322.content:
How did it come to this? You try to recall how this happened, but there are still parts you don't understand.

It all happened so fast. You were part of a wolf pack- not a huge one, but still a decent size. Relations with other packs were good for the most part and the only real threat to your life was the occasional threat of a lion attack. Thankfully, these creatures never attacked full-force. But then it happened- the poachers came. It wasn't like this hadn't happened before- usually, a few would show up, your pack would kill them and everyone would eat well for a few days. But there hadn't been a group half this size- at least a hundred or more of them all striking at once. The pack was totally unprepared and what followed wasn't a battle. It was a slaughter. Left and right, dear friends, old rivals and even your own family was ripped apart, and you couldn't save them. So how did you survive? By a bit of dumb luck- you fell into some mud and, apparently, they mistook you for a big rock.

It's unclear how long you waited, but by the time you got up, the damage... There were no words to describe what happened to your old home. All the wolves were either gone or (in the case of some poor sods) blown to meaty bits. The trees had all been torn down and burned. Life had just vanished. It was clear that you needed to leave this place. But would you join another pack, after all the pain of loss you have had?
111322.title: Review of the damage.

1113221.content: You sure that's a good idea?
1113221.title: A lone wolf... How original.

1113222.content: You decide you have to find a new pack. The only question is where to look?
1113222.title: Loneliness no longer.

12.content: Ok now choose your name or choose authors choice.
12.title: Omega male

121.content: Okay so your name is Jake. Are you a pup, an adolescent, or an adult wolf.
121.title: Jake, how old are you?

choices: Another pack/ your a lone pup.
1211.content: Okay, so your Jake, a cute little Omega pup. Are you part of the Western Pack, the Eastern Pack, another pack, or are you a lone wolf pup?
1211.title: Omega pup.

12111.content: Does this take place before or after the events of the movie?
12111.title: One last thing...

12113.content: Okay so are you from another pack outside the western and eastern territory or are you a lone pup?
12113.title: Another pack/ your a lone pup.

121131.content: Okay, are you from a pack from the north or the south?
121131.title: North or south?

choices: In a cave with other wolves staring at you.
In a cave alone for the moment./Still on the valley floor, and it's nightfall.
121132.content: Your name is Jake and you are an omega pup. You are on your own after your pack had been taken from you by men. You were wondering through the forests of Canada trying to find help. You had been walking for days trying to press on til you could find a pack, but you were on the verge of passing out from lack of sleep. You found yourself in a valley walking through it heading to where the sun sets, knowing the farther west you went, the more bountiful kills were for packs and the more likely you were able to find a pack, hopefully, one with an understandable leader. As you think you can't go another step, you feel the ground start to rumble. You see some of the tiny stones around you start jiggle around. You look up and what you see terrified you. It was a stampede of caribou coming towards you and fast. You waste no time and start to run as fast as you can away from them. As you run you look around for an area that would get you out of their way. With the herd closing in on you, you didn't see many options on what you could do. Soon you were starting to be surrounded and were trying to keep your self from getting stomped. Just as you saw and tried to go for a place to avoid their hooves, one hits you. It was instant blackout as the hoof made contact with your head and you fell to the valley floor unconscious. When you wake up you are.....
121132.title: Looking for a new pack.

1211321.content: Jake woke up in a cave. However, he was far from alone. He was surrounded by tons of other wolves. They...
1211321.title: Friends or foes?

choices: Had fur and eyes that were gold in color. (Kate, the Alpha)
Had fur as white as snow and eyes blue as the sky. (Lilly, The Omega)
12113211.content:
As Jake tried to sit up, he felt a sharp pain in his leg and on the back of his head. "Take it easy little one, your head took a good knock back there in the valley," said a kind female voice.

Jake layed back down and tried to see who was talking to him. His vision was blurry for a moment, but then as it cleared up he saw that the female wolf...
12113211.title: Wolves that cared.

121132113.content:
"Who are you?" asked Jake.

The female wolf said "My name is..."
121132113.title: Who's that wolf?

choices: Give us some more female names.
1211321132.content: She had a nice name. And it was...
1211321132.title: She called herself.

choices: Lie your way out of it
12113212.content:
"Alright who are you?!" One of the wolves growls,

Jake immediately thinks should he tell them his real name or a fake name.
12113212.title: Showed hostility.

choices: Still on the valley floor at night.
1211322.content: Jake was still passed out, but woke up a few seconds later. He woke up in...
1211322.title: Where am I?

choices: Stay to see who owned the cave.
12113221.content:
Jake was in a cave, alone... which was weird. If memory served him properly, he had been outside before. However, he was now in a cave, all by himself.

"I doubt that I just walked in here in my sleep" he thought to himself. Naturally, he wasn't sure whether he should be thankful that he was saved or if he should get out of the cave immediately. After all, it wasn't necessarily a wolf that brought him in there! He decided to...
12113221.title: Something's not right...

121132212.content: After waiting for a bit, Jake found who the owner of the cave was. It was a...
121132212.title: Paging cave owner... Are you there?

1211322122.content: So, if a wolf didn't save our hero, what did?
1211322122.title: Oh, snap.

12113222.content: Jake was where he had been- still in the valley. That stampede had really caught him off-guard. Looking himself over, he found his body was...
12113222.title: What a night!

1212.content: Do you have a pack, or are you a loner?
1212.title: Average teenage wolf.

1213.content: How far into adulthood are you?
1213.title: Omega adult- what stage?

12133.content: So, are you a member of the pack that the main characters are a part of?
12133.title: Near the end.

121332.content: Are you part of another pack?
121332.title: A different pack.

13.content: A female Alpha, huh? Nice! So, what do you look like?
13.title: Uptown girl.

131.content: Do you think that we could include Kate's daughter in this scenario, or would that be considered cheating?
131.title: Do I know you?

1312.content: So, what kind of wolfess would you care for?
1312.title: Figures.

13121.content: Is the main character a distant relation to a canon character?
13121.title: A distant relation?

1313.content: Is this wolf a friend of Kate's daughter?
1313.title: A friend of hers?

14.content: So you're an Omega. Oh, well; you can't win them all. So, what's your name?
14.title: Bottom of the wolf chain.

141.content: Your name is Annabelle. So, what role do you occupy?
141.title: A humble life.

1413.content: What role does Annabelle have?
1413.title: Other pack roles.

14133.content: Is Annabelle the pack leader? I know that Omegas are bottom of the chain in the wolf packs, but it is still possible.
14133.title: Unlikely scenario.

141331.content: How did an Omega take over the pack?
141331.title: When did this happen?

info.description:
Welcome to the first Alpha and Omega interactive.

Here are the rules:
1. No sexual scenes although some will be implied. Like just say you did it
2. No character death and I'm serious if a character dies I'll flag you
3 No dating any of the movie characters
3. Ok, you can date,
4. You can make them have little misadventures but dont end the story yet
5. other then that have fun
